page.title: 10CHILDRENS ACTIVITIES
page.content: These are some of the activities that children in Loxwood do in their spare time.{Indoors}they play on computers, play board games like snakes and ladders, ludo, chess, scrabble and monopoly. The most popular indoor activity is watching television. Lots of children watch "T.V.a.m." {Out of doors}children play on their bicycles, or roller skate down the slopes. Marbles is a popular game in Loxwood. Children also play soft tennis and hopscotch. Some play croquet.{After school}most children take part in activities like Cubs and Brownies. They go to Ifold or Alfold or Kirdford or Plaistow for these. {Popular sports in the area}are cricket, stoolball and angling. Children also have lessons in gymnastics, swimming and horse riding.
